welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Broomall, located in the heart of the United States! We are known for our charming atmosphere and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything our city has to offer.

terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Greater Wilmington Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting it from the list of available networks and entering a password provided by the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
